data.name: Dead Cells - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Music For Your Headless Self.


This is the Dead Cells Ost. From the game. There’s like songs with guitar, and songs without. Sometimes with other instruments. Like voices, from the past, but now in the future, which is the present.
There’s sounds from a cat purring too, hidden somewhere.

This full length soundtrack will enhance your ears with subtle epic music to lead you to a never-ending world of fantastic fantasy. Now you can be the cool kid in the neighborhood, and go slash slash roll all the way into the sunset, while jogging.

For Human and cat use ONLY.

All Jokes aside...

This is a work in progress OST for Dead Cells, that's to say there are currently 25 tracks totaling a little over 1 hours and 45 mins worth of music. As we add levels to the game and therefore new tracks, we'll add them here for free! Only MP3 available for now.


Here's the track list:

  • 1. Dead Cells 03:00
  • 2. Prisoner's Awakening 04:37
  • 3. Promenade Of The Condemned 06:18
  • 4. The Merchant 02:08
  • 5. Prison's Rooftop 06:51
  • 6. Black Bridge 03:40
  • 7. The Village 04:55
  • 8. Toxic Sewers 04:34
  • 9. Ossuary 04:45
  • 10. Elite Fight 01:29
  • 11. The Old Sewers 05:12
  • 12. The Cemetery 05:02
  • 13. Conjonctivius 03:56
  • 14. The Prison's Depths 03:40
  • 15. Prison Theme 04:09
  • 16. The Crypt 04:54
  • 17. Weapon Merchant 01:04
  • 18. Food Merchant 01:04
  • 19. The Temple 05:36
  • 20. ClockTower 04:26
  • 21. Formerly Know As Assassin 03:39
  • 22. Collector 01:45
  • 23. The Castle 05:05
  • 24. Hand Of The King 06:21
  • 25. Credits 06:19

data.short_description: This is a work in progress OST for Dead Cells, that's to say there are currently 25 tracks totaling around 1 hours and 45 mins worth of music. As we add levels to the game and therefore new tracks, we'll add them here for free! Enjoy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Whatever
  • Процессор: Not a potato
  • Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Intel HD
  • Место на диске: 200 MB
  • Звуковая карта: Not a potato
  • Дополнительно: It's a soundtrack, if you can play an MP3, your computer will be ok...
